content: big ball cat toy crochet pattern written by melissa trenado you will need…  chosen yarn color for ball  fiberfill stuffing  catnip optional  yarn needle to weave in ends  size d 3 25mm or desired crochet hook  stitch markers stitches and abbreviations used… chain - chain sl - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet st - stitch sts - stitches repeat - repeat increase - increase 2 single_crochet in the same space decrease - decrease or decrease single_crochet 2 together ball round 1 ~ using a magic_ring or chain 2 if you prefer place 6 single_crochet into the magic ring or into the 2nd chain from the hook round 2 ~ increase around 12 single_crochet round 3 ~ single_crochet in the next st increase / rptt around 18 single_crochet round 4 ~ single_crochet in the next 2 sts increase / repeat around 24 single_crochet round 5 ~ single_crochet in the next 3 sts increase / repeat around 30 single_crochet round 6 ~ single_crochet in the next 4 sts increase / repeat around 36 single_crochet rnds 7-14 ~ single_crochet around 36 single_crochet round 15 ~ single_crochet in the next 4 sts decrease / repeat around 30 single_crochet round 16 ~ single_crochet in the next 3 sts decrease / repeat around 24 single_crochet round 17 ~ single_crochet in the next 2 sts decrease / repeat around 18 single_crochet  add stuffing and catnip and more stuffing as needed round 18 ~ single_crochet in the next st decrease / repeat around 12 single_crochet round 19 ~ decrease around 6 single_crochet  sl in every other st fasten_off and weave in end i hope you enjoyed this crochet pattern if i have made any errors or if you have any questions feel free to contact me at any time please do not claim this pattern as your own i do not mind if you sell the finished product but do not sell this pattern as your own lionqueenmelissa@gmail com ravelry ~ lionqueenmelissa facebook ~ melissa s crochet patterns
